item.guid: IF YOU CAN SEE THIS TEXT, RSS v2 FEEDS ARE NOT SUPPORTED

item.title: IF YOU CAN SEE THIS BUT NO PRECEEDING TEXT, RSSv2 FEEDS ARE PROBABLY SUPPORTED
item.description: <font color=red>IF THIS TEXT IS SHOWN IN RED, INDIRECT HTML IS SUPPORTED</font>

item.title: IF NO TEXT IS SHOWN BELOW, NESTED DIRECT HTML IS NOT ALLOWED

description.font: IF THIS TEXT IS SHOWN IN RED, DIRECT HTML NAMESPACE IS SUPPORTED
